panama.log.rollover
Class TimeOfDayRolloverStrategy

java.lang.Object
  panama.log.rollover.TimeOfDayRolloverStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
RolloverStrategy
 class TimeOfDayRolloverStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RolloverStrategy

A RolloverStrategy that requests rollover at a specific time each day. Note that, because the strategy is only consulted at intervals, log files will usually contain records that are slightly past the rollover time (depending on the rollover interval).

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Graham Lea

Constructor Detail

TimeOfDayRolloverStrategy

TimeOfDayRolloverStrategy()

Creates a new SetTimeRolloverStrategy.

This constructor is only intended to be used by RolloverManager.

TimeOfDayRolloverStrategy

public TimeOfDayRolloverStrategy(java.util.TimeZone timeZone,
                                 int hour,
                                 int minute)
Creates a new SetTimeRolloverStrategy that will request log files be rolled at the specified time.

Parameters:
timeZone - the time zone in which the time is being specified
hour - the hour of the day at which to roll over (in 24 hour time, where 0 = midnight)
minute - the minute of the hour to roll over
Method Detail

configure

public void configure(java.util.Map properties)
               throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: RolloverStrategy
Reads from the given map any properties that affect the behaviour of this strategy.

Specified by:
configure in interface RolloverStrategy
Parameters:
properties - an unmodifiable map of properties, i.e. String keys with String values
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while configuring the strategy.

setRolloverTime

public void setRolloverTime(java.util.TimeZone timeZone,
                            int hour,
                            int minute)
Sets the time at which a rollover should be requested. Once the time has been set by this method, it will not be changed by calls to configure(java.util.Map).

Parameters:
timeZone - the time zone in which the time is being specified
hour - the hour of the day at which to roll over (in 24 hour time, where 0 = midnight)
minute - the minute of the hour to roll over

rolloverNow

public boolean rolloverNow(java.util.Date fileCreated,
                           long fileLength)
Description copied from interface: RolloverStrategy
Decides whether or not the log file should be rolled over immediately.

Specified by:
rolloverNow in interface RolloverStrategy
Parameters:
fileCreated - the date and time at which the current log file was created
fileLength - the current length of the log file
Returns:
true if the log file should be rolled over now, false if it should not.
